text: Caprinae is a subfamily of the even-toed ungulate family Bovidae. Animals of the Caprinae subfamily are called caprid or goat-antelope. The domestic sheep (Ovis aries) and domestic goat (Capra hircus) are part of this group. ==Taxonomy== * Subfamily Caprinae ** Genus Pantholops *** Tibetan antelope or Chiru (Pantholops hodgsonii) ** Genus Capricornis ** Genus Naemorhedus: Gorals *** Himalayan goral, Naemorhedus goral *** Long-tailed goral, Naemorhedus caudatus *** Red goral, Naemorhedus baileyi *** Chinese goral, Naemorhedus griseus ** Genus Oreamnos *** Mountain goat (Oreamnos americanus) ** Genus Rupicapra *** Chamois (Rupicapra rupicapra) *** Pyrenean chamois (Rupicapra pyrenaica) ** Genus Myotragus *** Myotragus balearicus â€  ** Genus Budorcas *** Takin (Budorcas taxicolor) ** Genus Ovibos *** Musk ox (Ovibos moschatus) ** Genus Hemitragus *** Himalayan tahr (Hemitragus jemlahicus) ** Genus Nilgiritragus *** Nilgiri tahr (Nilgiritragus hylocrius) ** Genus Arabitragus *** Arabian tahr (Arabitragus jayakiri) ** Genus Capra *** Wild goat (Capra aegagrus) *** Alpine ibex (Capra ibex) *** Walia ibex (Capra walie) *** West Caucasian tur (Capra caucasica) *** East Caucasian tur (Capra cylindricornis) *** Spanish ibex (Capra pyrenaica) *** Markhor (Capra falconeri) ** Genus Pseudois *** Bharal (Pseudois nayaur) *** Dwarf blue sheep (Pseudois schaeferi) ** Genus Ammotragus *** Barbary sheep (Ammotragus lervia) ** Genus Ovis ==Images== Image:Steinbock m.jpg|An Alpine Ibex or steinbock Image:Ovibos_moschatus_attackierend2.jpg|A Musk Ox Image:Ammotragus.JPG|Barbary Sheep Image:Schafe Bergweide.jpg|Domestic sheep
